text: Evane Hanska (Evelyne-Anne Pedrotti 4 April 1944 - 27 April 2021) was a French actress, and writer. She won the 1989 Mottart Prize, for La Romance de la Goulue. == Works == * Les Raouls, 1976 * Mes années Eustache, 2001 == Filmography == * La vie amoureuse de l’homme invisible (1971), * La Maffia du plaisir (1971), * La michtonneuse (1972), == References == Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French actors
title: Evane Hanska
